meta.description: Mathematical stability proofs and transition logic for degradation matrices

hysteresis_logic.problem: Oscillation between Green (High Precision) and Amber (Approximate)
hysteresis_logic.math: Switch Down if Quality < T_low; Switch Up if Quality > T_high (where T_high > T_low)

convergence.claim: System settles to the lowest cost state that satisfies Invariants.
convergence.proof_sketch: Lyapunov function V = Cost + Penalty(Invariant_Breach). V decreases monotonically.

green_to_amber.mechanism: Atomic switch of function pointers to 'Approximate' variants.

amber_to_red.mechanism: Shed load, disable non-critical paths, enforce 'Fail Closed'.
